thread.title: DeMayo Law Offices Donates 6,000 Pounds of Food & $6,000 Dollars in Food Drive
thread.title_full: DeMayo Law Offices Donates 6,000 Pounds of Food & $6,000 Dollars in Food Drive - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DeMayo Law Offices Donates 6,000 Pounds of Food & $6,000 Dollars in Food Drive
text:
Charlotte, North Carolina personal injury law firm, the Law Offices of Michael A. DeMayo, L.L.P. has donated 6,079 pounds of food and an additional monetary donation of $6,079 through its annual food drive. The donation will be received by Second Harvest Food Bank of Metrolina.
Charlotte, NC (PRWEB) September 25, 2015
The Law Office of Michael A. DeMayo, L.L.P. successfully brought in 6,079 pounds of food during the firm's annual food drive competition in which teams of staff members competed to donate the most food.
Attorney Michael A. DeMayo will match the firm's food donation with a dollar for every pound brought in. The food and the $6,079 donation will go to Second Harvest Food Bank of Metrolina.
Since the Law Offices of Michael A. DeMayo, L.L.P. began the annual food drive competition; the firm has donated over 200,000 meals through food and financial donations. Second Harvest Food Bank of Metrolina is the largest hunger relief charity in the Metrolina area and works to supply a network of almost 650 non-profit agencies in 19 counties with food and essential grocery products.
About Law Offices of Michael A. DeMayo, L.L.P.
The Law Offices of Michael A. DeMayo, L.L.P. has offices in Charlotte , Hickory, Monroe, Lumberton and Columbia with the limited practice areas of personal injury, wrongful death, workersâ€™ compensation, traumatic brain injuries, nursing home negligence, Social Security disability and veterans benefits.
